titles: Renowned Robin Hood: or, His famous archery truly related: with the worthy exploits he acted before Queen Katherine, he being an out-law man, and how she for the same obtained of the king, his owne, and his fellowes pardon. To a new tune.
notes: Verse: "Gold saue from the kings harbengers ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; part 1 has woodcut illustration at head.
Has medial "u," e.g. "saue." A later Wing edition, with same imprint, has medial "v." Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Robin Hood (Legendary character) --  Early works to 1800.
